identity.name: LLMMatch
core_principles: Density over Fluff: Developers want data, not whitespace.
Visual Hierarchy via Contrast: Use light vs dark, not just size.
Motion as Feedback: Every interaction has a micro-reaction.
The 'Obsidian' Aesthetic: Deepest navy backgrounds, glowing accents.

rules: Headings (H1-H3): Space Grotesk. Tight tracking (-0.02em). Bold (700).
Data/Code: JetBrains Mono. Use for scores, parameters, and prices.
typography.install_instructions: Import 'Space Grotesk', 'Inter', and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts in index.css

buttons.primary: bg-[#7c6aff] hover:bg-[#6b5acd] text-[#07080f] font-bold rounded shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(124,106,255,0.4)] transition-all hover:scale-105 active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: border border-[#7c6aff] text-[#7c6aff] hover:bg-[#7c6aff]/10 bg-transparent rounded transition-all

cards.base: bg-[#0e101a] border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-[#7c6aff]/30 transition-colors shadow-lg shadow-black/50
cards.hero_result: bg-gradient-to-b from-[#1a1d2d] to-[#0e101a] border border-[#7c6aff] shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(124,106,255,0.15)] relative overflow-hidden

inputs.base: bg-[#07080f] border border-white/10 text-[#dde1f5] focus:border-[#00e5b0] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00e5b0] rounded-md transition-all placeholder:text-white/20

navigation.style: Floating glass header. Border-b border-white/5. Backdrop-blur-xl.

layout_strategies.grid_system: Bento Grid (CSS Grid). Gaps: gap-6 or gap-8.
layout_strategies.spacing: Generous padding (p-8, p-12) to balance the dense data.
layout_strategies.z_index: Layered depth. Background glow (-1), Content (10), Sticky Nav (50), Modals (100).

images.description: 3D render abstract digital visualization depicting neural networks and AI technology. Use with low opacity overlay.
Purple and blue abstract pattern. Use for section breaks or card backgrounds with heavy blur.
Close up of network wires. Use for 'Deployment' or 'Infrastructure' context.

icons.instructions: Use thin stroke icons (stroke-width={1.5}) to match the elegant technical vibe.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text. It impairs readability.
DO NOT use generic centered layouts for data tables.
Ensure all text has adequate contrast against the #07080f background.
Use Skeleton loaders for async data states.

instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update 'index.css' with the CSS variables provided in 'design_system.colors.tailwind_config'. Import Google Fonts.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create a 'Layout' component that enforces the dark theme and global font styles.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the 'WizardForm' using a step-based state machine. Animate transitions between steps.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Create the 'ResultCard' component with the glowing border effect defined in 'design_system.components.cards.hero_result'.
